text: "Give Me You" is a 2000 song by Mary J. Blige and is the third single from her fourth studio album Mary. It went to number 19 in the United Kingdom, number 68 in the United States, number 58 in Australia, number 24 in Scotland and number 45 in Ireland. ==Track listings== ==References== Category:R&B; ballads Category:Soul ballads Category:2000 songs Category:2000s ballads Category:Mary J. Blige songs
title: Give Me You (Mary J. Blige song)
